elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Answer the questions about your training company.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: How does your training company dispose of waste and unsold goods?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Does your training company have binding guidelines regarding disposal/recycling? If yes, which ones? If not, which ones would you introduce in your company?

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What has changed in your teaching company in terms of the carbon footprint of products/services, disposal or recycling since working on the topic in BUA C?
